column4: Hey guys how can i change partition numbers?I mean: currently i have disk partitioned in this way [ sda1 sda2 sda4 sda5 sda6 sda7 sda8 ] How can i change it in [ sda1 sda2 sda3 sda4 sda5 sda6 sda7 ]? Thanks
You probably do not want to do that.
parts of your system may rely on the devices on your computer always being named the same.
what does it mean? I have done the wrong question?
